>::Prowl::
>
>Prowl's claws dig in further into Menasor as the gestalt flings his
>wrist away, managing to keep Prowl in place. His teeth slice through
>Menasor's wrists (I think they would, but its up to you how much
>damage or even if they did slice, Rdahl), several snapping off as the
>wrist leaves the mouth. He roars in pain, slamming his front legs
>into Menasor's neck and squeezing hard with his claws, mechfluid
>flowing out of his mouth.

OOC: No thats fine, I dont mind if you state that it slices in.

BIC:

As Menasor flew upward he looked at his wrist, the oil gushing out of it,
"Maximals..... Painful" he shouted, obviously enraged. Prowls claws did
little else on his body but keep him in place.
